original_text: The old rules said that the priest must use the blood of goats or bulls to make people clean. Or he could burn a young cow and mix the ashes with water. He would then splash the blood or the ashes over the people who were unclean. Then those people became clean again in their bodies, and they could worship God.
korean_text: 염소와 황소의 피와 및 암송아지의 재를 부정한 자에게 뿌려 그 육체를 정결하게 하여 거룩하게 하거든

sentences.original_text: The old rules said that the priest must use the blood of goats or bulls
sentences.korean_translation: 옛 규칙은 제사장이 염소나 황소의 피를 사용해야 한다고 말했다

sentences.original_text: Or he could burn a young cow
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그는 어린 송아지를 불태울 수 있었다

sentences.original_text: and mix the ashes with water
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 재를 물과 섞을 수 있었다

sentences.original_text: He would then splash the blood or the ashes over the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 피나 재를 사람들에게 뿌렸다

sentences.original_text: Then those people became clean again in their bodies
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그 사람들은 몸이 다시 깨끗해졌고
그리고 그들은 하나님을 경배할 수 있었다
